1.8.9.1.1:
Added forge update checker.
Fixed crash on servers.
Fixed creating duplicate textures every time you opened the backups GUI.
Fixed restore command using wrong backup.
1.8.9.1.2:
When entering a backup, region files are now copied on demand instead of all at once. This will greatly speed up entering a backup and decrease load on the disk.
Backup trimming is now configurable.
Fixed some things that could've cause errors in the future.
